entry.source: I'd like you to recover the legendary gem,{F801}the {F804,5}{F872,1},{F804,0} for me. According to old{F801}newspapers, people would bring their gems{F801}to Ginza to show them off. The {F872,1}{F801}immediately caught my eye. Apparently some{F801}of them are still somewhere in Tokyo!{F801}
